Sick's Stadium, Seattle, WA, 1946 - View of scoreboard shows Rainers playing San Francisco Seals. Building in distance is historic Franklin High School, 107-years-old and still open. And no surprise to see a Gold Shield coffee billboard on left hand side. Was phased out in 1970s https://t.co/R7mgMtK6aM
